sections.name: Theme
lyrics: ***Intro***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: There is a house in New Orleans
They call the Rising Sun
And it's been the ruin of many a poor boy
And God I know I'm one

sections.name: Theme
lyrics: ***Instru***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: My mother was a tailor
She sewed my new blue jeans
My father was a gamblin' man
Down in New Orleans

sections.name: Theme
lyrics: ***Instru***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Now the only thing a gambler needs
Is a suitcase and trunk
And the only time he's satisfied
Is when he's all drunk

sections.name: Solo
lyrics: ***Solo***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Oh mother tell your children
Not to do what I have done
Spend your lives in sin and misery
In the House of the Rising Sun

sections.name: Theme
lyrics: ***Instru***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Well, I got one foot on the platform
The other foot on the train
I'm goin' back to New Orleans
To wear that ball and chain

sections.name: Theme
lyrics: ***Instru***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Well, there is a house in New Orleans
They call the Rising Sun
And it's been the ruin of many a poor boy
And God I know I'm one

sections.name: Solo
lyrics: ***Solo***
